::Hevn::
       He pulls her close to him and holds her in an embrace for a long 
moment.  While she's still there he whispers in her ear.  "It's okay to be 
afraid.  And it's okay to be confused.  But sooner or later you will have to 
chose between life here and your old life with the Maximals.  Just know that 
no matter what, I'll be there."

--part1_1ec.7eab652.2be4b4e7_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
